title: Smurfing Tho..
body:
So as you may know, my main is "Arclight Vayne" (diamond 5, adc main.) and I recently leveled this account to 30. I went 6/4 with my provisionals playing strictly adc, vayne and ashe only. I feel like at low elo the games are so team reliant and so hard to win games by just being a good player by myself. I have played low elo before and carried games ez pz as other champs, other lanes but adc is real tough lol . Advice to anyone stuck in low elo, don't adc till you hit high gold/plat.

Unless ofcourse you have a duo partner :p

replies.body: That's interesting... I've never had a problem as of yet with climbing in low elo but I find jungle to be the easiest to carry from. No one knows how the hell to jungle in low elo.. They might have a chance at being slightly better at most roles but in jungle no one has a clue.
Don't forget Jungling has the biggest control of the game. You have access to the whole map and have the ability to dictate the lanes.
Yeah I feel that.. That was like the biggest boost to my knowledge in this game.. When I learnt that jungle is the most controlling role.. Which usually dictates  how the game goes

Im silver 4, and i would consider that low elo. last season i managed G3 but took alot of time off. Anyways, i feel this season adc is harder to carry from lower elos  as i main the role. 
where did you get placed going 6/4 on a fresh level 30? just out of interest.

Mid/jungle would be the better roles as a smurf in our elos. someone who when ahead, cannot be beaten easily. {{champion:7}} {{champion:92}} ect.
Gl with the climb mate. always up for a duo too if your on your way up :)
Aus Dave

Got placed Silver 3, high mmr, here is a screenshot of one of my silver 3 games: http://puu.sh/klW1P/cbf333ca38.png  (we won)

Skipped silver 2, currently in silver 1 promos, Always in game with low plats/high golds. Gold 1 mmr roughly. Currently 17Wins 7Losses, Giving it a break due to my last 2/3 losses were due to my 400ping.
I don't see why you had to smurf; eloboosters and smurfs have been ruining some of my ranked games. :(

Well you see, we want to practice for our main accounts, blind queue doesn't help, team builder doesn't help. We want to have the draft pick experience making it feel real, as well as have no consequences for losing if we DO happen to play poorly. We want to be able to play carefree without stressing about losing LP. So smurfing is the solution.
Well that is logical I suppose
assuming you never got carried by one before.. lol
honestly, ADC is just a lot harder in the current meta.

i believe top/mid are the best roles to carry in low elo
i seem to see a lot of adc's in low elo either go horribly behind like 0/5 or extremely fed because of support+jgler

Yeah this is incorrect, i am also diamond, and i struggle to lose games in anything below gold. I literally try and throw as hard as possible because i want my smurf to stay low elo, but we win anyway. Play whatever you want in low elo and you can win. On hit teemo jungle is one of my preferred picks
